document.full_text: the red bulls will play their third game of the m.l.s. season saturday night against houston and will be using their third goalkeeper -- bouna coundoul -- in the game.
document.title: for red bulls, 3 games, 3 keepers and a new tv deal
lines_and_colors: the red bulls will play their third game of the m.l.s. season saturday night against houston and will be using their third goalkeeper -- bouna coundoul -- in the game.
